thread.title: Nancy A
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Nancy A

author: Nancy A
title: Nancy A
text: Our service manager, Neil, went above and beyond in service. I came in with a damaged tire from a flat. I had purchased the life time replacement service years ago, but didn't have my receipt. His system only went back 3 years and I knew it was at least 5 years. Anyway, Neil made a phone call and was able to find my receipt. The tire was covered. So happy he went the extra step to save me some money!
